1.content: "arg" you say getting out of bed and turning of a alarm that had just turned on. shaking your head to clear your head you notce a big grey lazor thing in the middle of your room. "okay time to get dr.... wait WHAT!" you yell as you notice you have cloathes on and you get zaped by it.
1.title: waking up

11.content: "hello mr.glover" a voice said as you noticed you where moving throught a place that looked like stars. "you have been chosen, however when you get to there you will have some side efects." the voice says again as it starts to disapate." wait what do you mean!" you yell as the whole world seems to exlpode with you in it witch almoast frys you except you wake up almoast as if it was a dream. "aaaaaa" you say as you wake up and hit your head almmoast if you just dropped out of thin air in the middle of a room (hint, hint, nudge, nudge) as you look aroun you notice you are in what looks like
11.title: anime world

1112.content:
[for this story i will be with my freind ryan, if you want people to be with me pm me]

"ow" you say as you finaly fall down onto something, realising that you had your freind ryan over for a sleep over you quickly open your eyes, what you se greatly surprisesw you. you and ryan are fully dressed ontop of desks in a class room that has a zombie in front, and there all staring at you guys. "kishin" (canot spell that word for the life of me) you here a blond girl say as a boy beside her with red eyes turns into a scyth.realising instintly were you are and what it means, you grab ryan and dash out. after you dashed out of the class room you noticed all of the other students of dwma were out side that very classroom. they a gave you deathc glares as you ran blindly until you some how where at the roof of the school. relaxing and putting ryan down you walk over to the edge and look at death city.* crack* "huh"you said towards the noise as you turned around and noticed the roof uderneath ryan caving in. "perfect," you say as you run over to grab him but as you get to him the roof colapses on him, however you grab his hand just as he starts to fall."austin wats going on?" ryan asks as his eyes flutter open and realising that he was not in a bed. he also quickly realised that you were houlding him above a hole that if he fell down it he would die."Austin!" he yelled as you slid deper towards the hole.*footsteps* "just let me go, i cant let you die to just for me!" he yelled at austin just pleading for him to not give upo his life."not a chance ryan" you said as a hand witch had a yellow sleave and another hand with had a black sleave helped you bring him up. it was
1112.title: self and freinds

112.content:
waking up on something soft you realise you are face down on the floor.
"what the he?" you say as you cut yourself off due to your voiuce being like a girls and you feeling strange.
"great," you say as you roll your eyes and feel something on your wrist. "not only im i in kampfer" you say breaking the 4th wall "but i am a kanpfer, hey wait what color is my contract bracelit as you look down and notice it is
112.title: kampfer

1121.content: "great" you say again as you turn normal. "well might as well figure out where i am "you say and notice a doll where you where."hi Austin" it said as you tried to understand what it looked like. "since you already know about whut is going, i dont need to explain it to you" said the doll as it became more view able. what you saw next whas surprising, a wall that was conveiniently placed beside you got shot. "WOW!" you say surprised as three people come out of hiding and it is the
1121.title: white

choices: sleep, makito rives in the morning
11211.content:
"give it up!" the redhaired one said.quicly you place your arm into one of your pockets but it dident help as it started glowing. as they got into battle stance you just shruged and said "you have no idea what you are getting into" as you changed into kanpfer mode.realising that you dont have a gun or a sword type thing you must be a magic kanpfer. "dont let your guard down even for one second!" the black haired one said. "wait, wait," you say trying to get them to reason but it was too late. they started atacking and before you said wait one more time they all fell to the floor with burn marks on their bodys and steam rising up from your hand. "who are you" the red one said as you walked up to them and turning back to normal. "seems like you all let your guard down as soon as you started atacking" you said as you got right beside them. then the three entrails dolls that the had came out and protected them. "we wont let you touch these campfers!" they all said eyeing you and your entrails doll. they seamed to be the ones that the three got when kaeda lent them to them. "relax" you and your doll said, "we will fight for you guys if, and only if you tell us one thing" "what is the one thing you want to know!?" the red haid yelled angrilly as you repllied. "do you think kaeda is a regular person?" "yeah" they all replied almoast as if on cue. "okay now i no when we are" you quietely said to yourself as you helped them up. "you all need rest, you all shoud go to her (points to the main char) place and rest, i will help you there because im fealing happy today"

30 minutes of walking later

finaly you where at their house as you hellped them in and almoast past out with your doll thing on your lap as you sat down on chair as they fell asleap.
11211.title: good kanpfers

choices: during the bttle she has with her freinds
112111.content: as you are sleaping a little dream plays out as you try to wake up. the dream is that you are a kanpfer and you are in the show. "wake up" says a voice just outside our head. then your head sudenly herts realy bad as you wake up with makito looking at you through a hole. you put your hand at the back of your head as you pass out and wake up
112111.title: sleep, makito rives in the morning

12.content: Suddenly, your eyes are filled with many many screens of various video games. Some of them get bigger and bigger as they draw close to you....or you draw closer to them. Which one gets the biggest?
12.title: video game world

13.content:
After having been zapped by a mysterious laser of some sort, you're currently being hurled towards an dimension that you've never been to or heard of as you soon wind up in another dimension of some sort.

You're now in another dimension of some sort as you pick yourself up and dust yourself off as you look at your surroundings as you're trying to figure out where in the world you're at as you appear to be in one of a few dimensions.

And one of those dimensions you're in are as follows.

Sumo City All Stars Dimension: You're in the Sumo City All Stars Dimension as you're about to be assisted by the Sumo City All Stars themselves.

Dog Kong Dimension: You're in the Dog Kong Dimension as you're about to be introduced to Dog Kong himself.

Fat Giants and Giantesses Dimension: You're in the fat giants and giantesses dimension, try not to get squashed like a pancake.

Cartoon Wrestling Dimension: You're in the cartoon wrestling dimension, let's get ready to rumble!!

Other: You're in another dimension of some sort.
13.title: Any other world.

info.brief_description: get transported into a anime/game/ anything else that has a plot by a laser
info.description: you wake up in your bed with somehow all your cloathes and a lazor that somehow got in your room zaps you
